OpenFeintX Class Reference

List of all members.

Static Public Member Functions

static void OFXUserWillEnterStore ()
 Tells that the player is about to enter the store. This must be called before the player enters the store. This will cause certain UI screens to appear to keep the user form losing data.
static void OFXUserWillLeaveStore ()
 Tells that the player is about to leave the store. This must be called when the player leaves the store in order to serialize the inventory and a server synchronization.
static void OFXRestoreStoreKitNonconsumablePurchases ()
 Attempts to restore all purchases items associated with the logged-in iTunes Store account. This will only restore items configured as non-consumable, unique, and paid for via StoreKit.

 Access the amount of a specific currency in the user's inventory.

 Stores arbitrary information associated with a player's use of the the items in their inventory. This information is stored alongside the inventory on the OpenFeint servers. For example, this could be used to track which items a player has equipped:
static string OFXExistsInMetadata (string slot)
 Restores the arbitrary information associated with a player's use of the the items in their inventory. This information was stored alongside the inventory on the OpenFeint servers. For example, to figure out what item identifier is equipped in the "head" slot: string equipped = OFXEsistsInMetadata("head");.

 Removes the arbitrary information associated with a player's use of the the items in their inventory.

static string OFXPurchaseFormattedPrice (string itemIdentifier)
 A string containing the formatted price for this item. If this item is sold for hard currency ($) the string will be localized to the logged-in StoreKit account's locale. If this item is sold for virtual currency the string is simply a concatenation of purchaseCurrencyAmount and purchaseCurrency.name.

 Returns true if the item is a free download. This will always return false for paid items even if the player already owns the item and can re-download it for free.

Member Function Documentation

static void OpenFeintX.OFXAddToMetadata ( string  itemIdentifier,
string  slot 
) [inline, static]

Stores arbitrary information associated with a player's use of the the items in their inventory. This information is stored alongside the inventory on the OpenFeint servers. For example, this could be used to track which items a player has equipped:

  • Mark that item identifier "wooden_bow" was equipped in "main_hand" slot: OFXAddToMetadata("wooden_bow", "main_hand");
Parameters:
itemIdentifierItem identifier.
slotSlot.

Returns:
Quantity of the given currency possessed by the user.
Parameters:
currencyhe currency identifier to query the quantity of.

Determines if the inventory can hold any more of the given item.

Returns:
True if more of the specified item can be acquired, false otherwise.
Parameters:
itemIdentifierIdentifier of the item to check.

currencyIdCurrency identifier.
static string OpenFeintX.OFXExistsInMetadata ( string  slot) [inline, static]

Restores the arbitrary information associated with a player's use of the the items in their inventory. This information was stored alongside the inventory on the OpenFeint servers. For example, to figure out what item identifier is equipped in the "head" slot: string equipped = OFXEsistsInMetadata("head");.

Returns:
The exists in metadata.
Parameters:
slotSlot.

categoryThe category to filter by.

static double OpenFeintX.OFXPayloadProgressForItem ( string  itemIdentifier) [inline, static]

Returns the payload download progress for a given item.

This method can only return a non-zero value if payloadStatusForItem is ItemPayloadStatus_Loading, signifying that a download is in progress.

Returns:
Current download progress for the given item identifier's payload download.
Parameters:
itemIdentifierItem identifier.

static string OpenFeintX.OFXPurchaseFormattedPrice ( string  itemIdentifier) [inline, static]

A string containing the formatted price for this item. If this item is sold for hard currency ($) the string will be localized to the logged-in StoreKit account's locale. If this item is sold for virtual currency the string is simply a concatenation of purchaseCurrencyAmount and purchaseCurrency.name.

Returns:
The purchase formatted price.
Parameters:
itemIdentifierItem identifier.
static bool OpenFeintX.OFXPurchaseIsFree ( string  itemIdentifier) [inline, static]

Returns true if the item is a free download. This will always return false for paid items even if the player already owns the item and can re-download it for free.

Returns:
The purchase is free.
Parameters:
itemIdentifierItem identifier.

True if the content purchase is possible, false otherwise.

static Hashtable OpenFeintX.OFXPurchaseProperties ( string  itemIdentifier) [inline, static]

Returns a Dictionary<property, value> with all purchase properties. Valid properties: category, storeKitProduct, storeKitPurchaseStarted, cachedStoreKitPrice, purchaseCurrencyIdentifier, deliverableIdentifier, position.

static void OpenFeintX.OFXRemoveFromMetadata ( string  slot) [inline, static]

Removes the arbitrary information associated with a player's use of the the items in their inventory.

Parameters:
slotSlot.
static void OpenFeintX.OFXRestoreStoreKitNonconsumablePurchases ( ) [inline, static]

Attempts to restore all purchases items associated with the logged-in iTunes Store account. This will only restore items configured as non-consumable, unique, and paid for via StoreKit.

This method may ask the user to login with their iTunes Store account. Upon completion of the restore the event OnStoreKitNonconsumableRestoreFinished will be trigged.

static void OpenFeintX.OFXStoreInventory ( ) [inline, static]

Writes the current inventory and unsent transaction logs to disk. Calling this insures that the data will not be lost in the case of the application stopping unexpectedly.

static void OpenFeintX.OFXSynchronizeInventory ( ) [inline, static]

Writes the current inventory to the server for permanent storage. Since this is an HTTP request, it is not recommended during gameplay.

This method may result in a user-facing UIAlertView when there are any inventory modifications on the server or if the user had last updated on a different device. Triggers OnInventorySynchronized when complete.

static void OpenFeintX.OFXUpdateCatalogFromServer ( ) [inline, static]

Downloads any updated catalog information from the OpenFeint servers. This is automatically called during application initialization.

static void OpenFeintX.OFXUserWillEnterStore ( ) [inline, static]

Tells that the player is about to enter the store. This must be called before the player enters the store. This will cause certain UI screens to appear to keep the user form losing data.

static void OpenFeintX.OFXUserWillLeaveStore ( ) [inline, static]

Tells that the player is about to leave the store. This must be called when the player leaves the store in order to serialize the inventory and a server synchronization.
